name: Teeth (vvv jam)
description:
Bark bark bark. Remember to floss regularly for best gum health.

Created with Christina Daeun Paik for dmg.to's vvv jam.

Using the Intel RealSense D415 and Scatter.co's DepthKit, we captured volumetric video of a small chattering teeth toy. This was then brought into Unity using the DepthKit plugin, into a set inspired by the Red Room in Twin Peaks. 

The music is Erik Satie's Gnossienne No.3
